website_summaries.verdict: The HP LaserJet Pro M1536dnf doesn't really excel in any one particular area, but it's a competent all rounder that will fit in nicely in most home offices.
cons: graphics print quality could be better

customer_reviews.title: HP gets it right with this one
customer_reviews.text: This printer delivered what was promised, and has worked very well for me. I don't use it for a fax, but appreciate that I could if necessary. I do use it as my local office printer, scanner and copier. It does a nice job of feeding, scanning and printing. Installation with Windows 7 was straightforward. Pros: good paper feeding, excellent print quality, many function options that work intuitively, very good value Cons: a bit bulky, there is some mechanical noise while moving paper, ships with a low-capacity toner cartridge If this unit demonstrates typical HP reliability, it will keep me happy until it becomes hopelessly obsolete (like me)!
customer_reviews.author: RTfact

customer_reviews.title: The Honda Accord of laser printers
customer_reviews.text: I've printed out about 30,000 pages on mine, and it keeps on working. It also scans things well. I've used it for faxes, but that is so 1987. The refilled cartridges cost about $14, and one in four of those isn't any good, but they are so much cheaper than OEM that I just buy four at a time and it is still less than OEM and print quality is very good. I liked it so much, I recently purchased a second one and it was less than half the price of the original a couple years back. It will stick out from the shelf you put it on, but that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: It was as if the heavens opened up and delivered the most awesome printer in the history of printers!! The print quality is excellent. Setup was easy. I can scan images, and have no complaints. ...but the most awesome feature was an absolute surprise to me. Inside, a team of elves monitor an e-mail account 24/7 for incoming messages from me. When I forward an e-mail from my smartphone to the printer's e-mail address, it magically prints. All other e-mails from other senders are ignored. This feature alone might be a contributing factor to the future of the world, including world peace and the cure for cancer. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ARW

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good printer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this printer came up in my search for Color Multifunction printers, the key being color. I needed the color so I ordered two after checking the specs on HP's website. Seemed like the perfect match for my needs at an unbelievable price. Unfortunately with all of my research I overlooked the fact that this is a monochrome printer, that is why the price was so great. I had to return them, but they seemed like great printers if you need monochrome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark (.

customer_reviews.title: RELIABLE. LONG-LASTING.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model printer a long time ago; it is a work-horse; I am a mobile notary, and have printed literally thousands of pages on this printer, and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Patty V.

customer_reviews.title: I've been enjoying this units pretty well. Functions well and very durable
customer_reviews.text: This has been awhile, but from the date I got this, I've been enjoying this units pretty well. Functions well and very durable. Only things I've done to this is changing the toner. This has not given me any paper jam not any malfunctions. I just love this!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Printer!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is quiet and does everything I need even better than expected. I replaced a Brother that I had so much trouble with so it wouldn't have taken much to please me..........but I am so very happy. I also have a very old HP LaserJet that I love too.........HP knows how to make a printer that works well. If the ink gets low, just shake it up and you'll get lots more pages. Scan works great....Nice crisp copies. Can't say enough about this printer. I've been using it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Device.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer, copier, scanner 6/15/14 and until today I was reasonably satisfied considering the cost. However today I discovered that the scanner reduces the image's physical size. The largest reduction happened when I scanned with the general purpose setting. The reduction was less but still totally unacceptable when scanned as text. Had I known before I bought it, I would never have purchased this device. I do not recommend it to anyone who needs scanned images at full physical size. There may be a work around, but if there is I completely resent it. That would be an extra time consuming burden on me.
customer_reviews.author: Edward H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Multifunction Printer Especially For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This printer replaced my HP LaserJet 2200DN & my OfficeJet 4110. Have read elsewhere the duplexer was noisy, not so, compared to my 2200, also that the scan software was lacking. For basic scanning the included software is great. Easy to set up, fast printing, scan and copy work great. After a week of use have not missed color printing capabilities, again, impressed with the speed and simplicity of all functions.
customer_reviews.author: H G Turner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Easy Apple compatibility - a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: I got this in December, and it has seamless Snow Leopard compatibility with my macbook air. I plugged the ethernet cable in the back of the printer from my router, and immediately found the printer on my network from both my macbook air and iPad. AirPrint from the iPad worked perfectly--both single and double sided. No drivers or firmware or anything needed to be updated. Setup literally took minutes. The only downside is that the printer seems a bit louder than my last HP printer. But that is just a minor complaint, if one at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: HP quality and reliabilty
customer_reviews.text: The PRO M1536DNF is not the low end of HP MFP's and certainly not the high end but it functions well. It is sturdy which is what I expect from HP and fairly reliable. It does suck up toner because the cartridges are smaller. The network scan capability is great for a small workgroup. Printing is quick with nice even grayscale coverage. I have a couple of these for smaller workgroups and the users are happy!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: hp laser jet pro m1536dnf
customer_reviews.text: as a printer all hps print great but this modle cheats you on toner. i printed 9 pages the software said 30. my old hp 2100 the toner lasted six months min. this one one month with the same use but its suposed to be designed for pro use. the fax function does not recieve all faxes so now i have a Brother doing most of the work and use this printer to print x rays only because Brother does not print x rays or images but the toner lasts much longer
customer_reviews.author: vlad isak

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Update - maybe not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Hard working printer. Happy with the quality. 4 stars. Update 7/31/15 - Document feeder now not working and the printer is buggy (e.g. sometime says it is receiving a fax - but it is not). This is a low-medium use unit on a good surge protector - no reason for it to crap out like this so early - 1 year 7 months old. 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: EAMH

customer_reviews.title: works great for office of 6
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace an older HP LaserJet. Set up only took a few seconds for Macs, and a few minutes for PCs. Everyone can now print and scan no matter which device or how they're connected to the network, and it's much simpler than the other multifunction that we have in the office, which is a Brother.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Roberts

customer_reviews.title: They work fine for only $10-$15ea
customer_reviews.text: This is an older model without all the latest features, but it is a workhorse. I bought this one as a backup for one I have been using in my business for three years. Toner capacity is a bit small, but you can offset the cost by buying the cheap toner from China. They work fine for only $10-$15ea.
customer_reviews.author: G. David

customer_reviews.title: Scan feeder doesn't work, support is useless!
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, the scan feeder pulled the pages in crooked. Spent 30min looking through HP's site and on the phone with India, to no avail. Their support is an absolute waste of time. Based on other reviews, the feeder appears to be a common problem. I'm returning the unit. It's also very slow to start up for printing the first page, and is very noisy. Not pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great small office machine
customer_reviews.text: This was used for an executive in a company where printing, copying and scanning are a must and ease of use is also required. It was nice to be network-able so that he can print from his desktop and his laptop without needing to connect a cable or switch between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: Just received the device and like it. Easy set up, no issues to set direct (USB) connection or network connection. I use it as a network printer for my home office and have absolutely no issues with software on all my Windows PCs. The only reason why it is not 5-star rating is that such a company like HP could include USB and data cable in the standard pack. Luckily I've had all necessary cables to set up, but this one small point disappoints... Why couldn't they put 2 small cables in the pack?
customer_reviews.author: Totemus

customer_reviews.title: HP Laserjet Pro M1536
customer_reviews.text: It's very good printer overall. Work well with copying, scanning, and faxing. There's a slight problem though; it sometime seems to drop off the network. To correct the problem, just turn off and turn it back on. Another problem is that the toner only yields between 1700 to 1900 pages; I wish HP makes larger toner for this printer. I also wish that this printer has the "Scan To" button/feature (HP has this feature in previous model), so that I can just insert documents and press "Scan To" button to scan without having to start scan program on my pc.
customer_reviews.author: V. Nhek

customer_reviews.title: Quality Fax and Copy Device for CPA firm
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 7 yr old HP similar device and need fax capability to secure Social Security numbers and a quick copy device for small jobs. HP again produced a product to handle the needs of a CPA firm satisfying specific needs with quality faxes and copies. 12/29/2015 A little over 1 year old the machine and its twin in my second office both have dark lines in outgoing and incoming faxes. The machines cannot be repaired. What a disappointment and what has happened to the quality of HP products?
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: this is a great MFP
customer_reviews.text: We already have one and decided to get a second for another office. It is FAST, reasonably quiet, and scans and faxes very efficiently. Consumables are not expensive in the long run. We have been delighted with our first one. Grabbed this as a closeout. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: HP is like a box of chocolate, you never know what to expect.
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate but hate the printer. Stuck with toner and a broken printer. Part is not found in the USA, ships from China and no guarantee it will be the right part!
customer_reviews.author: Tt

customer_reviews.title: Multifunction Printer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second 1536 we have purchased. I am very pleased with each of the four functions of this machine. Copy, fax, scan and printing. All perform effectively. Amazon continues to do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: M. Slee

customer_reviews.title: Great for a home MFD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for home use 2.5 years ago still have not had to replace the toner and it works great! In fact it works better than some of the expensive machines I use at work and I can even print to it from my phone even when I'm not home!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Quick Shipping & Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: Printer arrived very quickly and in great condition. Setup was standard for a multifunction printer. Very little headache!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: auto document feeder doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: i'm very disappointed with this purchase. after only a few uses the auto-document feeder has stopped working. this was a primary reason i bought this machine - to scan multi page documents with ease. the machine takes one, maybe two pages and then jams every time now... and then you have to restart the machine, etc. - so the auto document feeder is useless. other reviews listed this as a problem, wish i heeded their warning and did not purchase this machine! i do not recommend you purchase this if you require that to work.. otherwise it is a decent printer
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: HP is solid
customer_reviews.text: As an IT professional I really like the HP laserjet, they always work like advertised. No frills, not real pretty but it gets the job done and you can depend on it.
customer_reviews.author: C.W. Dykes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great.
customer_reviews.text: This HP multi-function works great. Easy to use. Very intuitive. Great printer - fast with crisp, clean printing. The scanner, copy, and fax functions all work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer. Faxing, Scanning, Copying. It also has printing but I have another color laser printer so I don't use the printing capability on this printer much. I have printed few pages and they do come out nice. Easy button to read and understand. Don't really need a manual for instructions if you are little knowledgeable with technology.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer for a small business
customer_reviews.text: This printer has been a great purchase for our small office. I love that I can print anything from my phone or any computer anywhere by just an email address. We go through cartridges every 3 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Buying a THIRD one for my office
customer_reviews.text: I run a small business and have never, ever had a problem with this printer/fax/copier. It's easy to find the toner at a reasonable price. At this time, all of my employee's workstations are slowly being converted to them. The oldest is now 3 years old and I have never had to have it serviced or repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Once I had it hooked up I'm really amazed how much nicer it is compare to my old ...
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple of months to get it assembled. Once I had it hooked up I'm really amazed how much nicer it is compare to my old one. It is smaller, which is good, the printing is much better. I have always liked Hewlett Packard printers. They seem to get better and better. I'll buy another one when I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Lynch

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME Printer.... Love the quality of the prints. Use the printer everyday and the prints are very clean, clear, and crisp. Would recommend this printer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Printer for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This printer was intended to be used as a secondary printer in a small chiropractic office. It is quiet and performs all tasks as expected. The only downside to this printer is that the temporary toner cartridge that comes with this printer needed to be changed very quickly. Even though this is common, it seemed to wear out even quicker than others in the past. All in all, it is a good printer at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: David McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great printer-fax-copier for a small business office.
customer_reviews.text: Has a few quirks that take some "getting used to," but is a reliable and fast printer.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Raubach

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer. I have a real estate office, printing never stop and this printer does just that.
customer_reviews.text: this will be my third identical printer I purchased in the past 2 years. I love it, dependable, fast and helps my business be productive.
customer_reviews.author: elena katarsky

customer_reviews.title: lack of cable
customer_reviews.text: i bought the same printer in China 2 years ago. In US, it's cheaper, but in the box it lack a cord to connect the printer to a laptop/computer and I had to buy a cable in the store myself.
customer_reviews.author: windie

customer_reviews.title: Quality all-in-one
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a HP 8000 that was over 10 years old. I wanted a laser all-in-one. It is a bit noisy but I can live with that considering the price and the features. I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: College Professor

customer_reviews.title: Fast and full of features
customer_reviews.text: My laptop detected the printer and would print without installing the driver. Nice but there were some issues that were solved by installing the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Yawstring

customer_reviews.title: Good All In One Unit
customer_reviews.text: All in one laser is a good choice. Print, copy and scan. Fax too but I don't use it. I got rid of my flat bed scanner after buying this unit. The cartridges are widely available.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: Great laser b/w printer. Saves $$$$ on ink. Got rid of all my ink jet printers.
customer_reviews.author: inphoenix

customer_reviews.title: Liked min so much ordered one for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Liked min so much ordered one for a gift. Doubled sided saves so much paper and the ink lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gg

customer_reviews.title: Prints some of the time!
customer_reviews.text: Occasionaly, receive error code 79 when trying to print wirelessly. The only work around is to clear print queue on computer you are using to print wirelessly. I am not happy about this and would expect better from an HP product.
customer_reviews.author: LJT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, but bought another computer and found out this was not bluetooth compatible :(
customer_reviews.author: Eyes4younme

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with an HP
customer_reviews.text: Great printer! Does everything I ask of it, and is very quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Really like this printer
customer_reviews.text: Really like this printer. Already had some for my office and it works well for our checks due to the way the paper pulls. So glad was able to get this.
customer_reviews.author: CDantzler

customer_reviews.title: 49 error - support was worthless
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box. connected the printer to my network. I have windows, ubuntu, mac clients to help configure it. Whenever the printer was connected to the network, the printer would crash within 5 minutes and give a 49 error. HP support was not helpful and refused to provide a return label. It went back to amazon today. frustrating. I tried support three separate times to help resolve the issue and find a "good" support person. They were all worthless.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lelivelt

customer_reviews.title: Goes through ink like crazy.
customer_reviews.text: Goes through ink like crazy...our last printer, for the same job, lasted 2-3 months per cartridge. We are lucky to get through 3-4 weeks per cartridge with this guzzler.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The doc feeder rollers were old and stared jamming after one week
customer_reviews.author: armando Donjuan

customer_reviews.title: HP LaseJet Pro M1536dnf is Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This printer is amazing. HP did a wonderful job on making this as easy as possible to install, operate and configure for the internet. I would recommend this printer to anyone who has a home or business office where you need to have a reliable printer and fax.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Nathanson

customer_reviews.title: HP Laser Jet Pro M1536dnf Multifunction Printer
customer_reviews.text: Yes, easy to set up and works great. You get clear copies and do not have to change the ink cartridge very often. It lasts and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: Just started using the unit. Easy to hook up. Scans well.
customer_reviews.author: HP Victim

customer_reviews.title: The HP LaserJet Pro M1536dnf MFP is the perfect printer for a small to medium office
customer_reviews.text: The HP Laserjet Pro M1536dnf MFP was easy to unpack and install. All functions worked as expected. The print speed and quality is excellent. It is the perfect printer for a small to medium office.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Barrier

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, very happy and satisfied with my purchase, really recommend both the product and the seller.excellent product, very happy and satisfied with my purchase, really recommend both the product and the seller. very good results
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Setting up the printer was so easy and all the specifications that I reviewed before buying it were just as described. After about 1 month of use, I can simply say that the product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Laser printer
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great printer and I am very pleased with the results. There is nothing negative I have found in six months of using it. The feature I love the most is that I can print from my iPhone and iPad without having to install hardware or download an app. The reason I gave it 4 stars was because it took too long to receive. I believe I waited around two full weeks for it and in my opinion anything that takes over 5 days to receive is too long.
customer_reviews.author: Ern

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse printer.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first laser printer and I am impressed by the difference in speed. This is going to satisfy my small business needs very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Darden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great multi-function device for the price. Easy to unpack and configure. Not too heavy, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gene R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent combo black & white printer
customer_reviews.text: So far the printer is great. Works on my Macintosh and Windows computer. Just plug it into the network and the computers saw it. The black toner cartridge is a bit small, but the printer is not too big either. I love the ability to print duplex.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Crane

customer_reviews.title: It's output is fine, but the cartridge capacity is poor.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that the 78A cartridges are the only ones available, and that with a 2000 page capacity, it is pitiful.
customer_reviews.author: CityGuySailing

customer_reviews.title: Great MFP
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this MFP. Prints fast! Easy set up. Compact verses my old Xerox just replaced with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: mlyons

customer_reviews.title: best printer I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and fast. If you need a quality printer and you have an all Mac environment (didn't test it on PC but would imagine it would be fine), this is a fine selection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good printer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This printer is a value for a small business or home office. Our business has purchased 15 of these units over the last two years. Some of the printers are in high activity departments and still get the job done without issue. Yes they use a lot of toner cartridges, but cost per page is comparable to out printers that have larger cartridges that have as well higher prices.
customer_reviews.author: J.F. LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Multifunction Printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer works very well on all three functions. However, when installed with Windows 7 it does required to download the most current drivers from HP. The CD software and Drivers are not the latest and incomplete specially for the scanner setup
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS G.

customer_reviews.title: HP LaserJet Pro 1536nf
customer_reviews.text: This all-in-one printer works as advertised. I bought it because I needed a printer that is AirPrint capable and it is, although it was not so indicated on the carton, which caused me some initial anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: jimmiethegeek

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not a home run.
customer_reviews.text: This machine does everything it was forecasted to do. There are better products out there but for my minimal needs this was adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Partrick J Sharkus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great for what it does. It does not copy in color (not that I expected it to). I really like the feature of being able to sheet feed copies on the top. I probably spent more than I wanted to, but it does a lot and fills my needs, so it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire D

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, fast and great features. The only downside is it does not print in color. That was to be expected. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mel R

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: Generates clean reports, scanner easy to configure and use, top sheet feeder works well, easy software install and configuration, compact footprint!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Halderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Unit! No complaints, highly recommend this unit if it fits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Menchey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer
customer_reviews.text: Have an older version of this HP. Good multifunction printer, we aren't using the fax option on it but printing and scanning works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Marcoccia

customer_reviews.title: Hp Pro M1536dnf
customer_reviews.text: The printer works very well and seems to be very reliable. The print quality is fantastic, and the speed is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Manu Elloie

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer! I was a bit concerned because it was fairly inexpensive, but it is the best printer I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Claussen

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. I thought it was wireless. I had to use a USB cable to connect remotely to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer--Reliable Service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent basic black and white MFP. Great for a small office or business. I would recommend this printer to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Lucker

customer_reviews.title: MICEY MOUSE COPIER A TOY UNFIT FOR RESIDENTIAL USE
customer_reviews.text: MICKEY MOUSE SCANNER/COPY MACHINE DO NOT BUY. This piece of garbage broke after 3 years of residential use. The Feeder just stopped working. When it did work, it performed like a Mickey Mouse scanner AT BEST. Don't be fooled and save you rmoney.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT

customer_reviews.title: It can't reconize in coming fax when working with high speed internet
customer_reviews.text: Everything work fine except it is noisier compare to Brother printer. The only reason I lower my rating on this printer is because it can send fax but it can't recognize in coming fax. I use AT&T U-verse Internet. A HP printer service technician told me that I can ask AY&T to slow down my internet speed to make my printer work on receiving fax. I have an old HP all-in one Photosmart C6180 it works good on sending and receiving fax. I just set up both printers to work together. I hope HP can upgrade their printer software in order to wok compatibly with the high speed internet
customer_reviews.author: An V To

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a company, and they were referred to it. Don't have experience using it day to day, but it sounds like it's been a good printer so far.
customer_reviews.author: Floline Media

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer/scanner/fax! I use this for my home office and haven't had any complaints! If I had to say one thing about it, the scanner is kind of loud but definitely not anything to complain about. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Drzewicki-Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly what I needed. I am very pleased with it and would get it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Gavit

customer_reviews.title: One year experience
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the HP LaserJet 1536dnf for over a year now and have been pleasantly surprised. As others noted, set up was simple. My usage is fairly heavy (about 600 pages/week, almost all using the duplexer, and mostly using generic cartridges [about one/week]). Although it is somewhat noisy, copies are clear and I have had no paper jams or other significant problems of any kind. None of the plastic parts have broken. The scanner & FAX also work fine. In summary, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: M.S. Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Did the great printing and scan jobs. It is very functional. It is a right choice and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: steven ting

customer_reviews.title: Returned defective item
customer_reviews.text: software did not load without hp remote help - 2 hours. Fax did not work after 5 hours online and remote with hp tech support. Returned item
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: LaserJet Pro
customer_reviews.text: Of the 3 I ordered 2 have been installed, the people using them are happy with the printer and especially the ability to copy.
customer_reviews.author: CKJ

customer_reviews.title: Not supported on MacOS 10.7
customer_reviews.text: The geniuses at HP shipped this with a driver disc that refuses to install on anything newer than MacOS 10.6. HP's recommended remedy is to use Software Update to obtain drivers for 10.7. Obviously, Software Update can not install updates for software that one did not have installed in the first place. HP "support" has been utterly useless in resolving the problem. Planning on returning this piece of trash unless I can foist it on some other poor sap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Love It !
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to myself as a Christmas present since older printers don't like to work with Windows7. It was a dream to install - painless and perfect the first time. All functions work (fax/scan/print/copy) without issue - and quick ! This printer really spits out the pages. The ability to duplex is a great paper saver since a lot of my documents are fairly large. A great machine at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Hoever

customer_reviews.title: Decent printer
customer_reviews.text: Its fast, kinda loud but does what it was purchased for more or less. Only complaint is that hpeprint.com is very unreliable. Tried to utilize it for business instead of aol.com account but I was not getting all documents that I was suppose to and error messages or print confirmations were erratic. I've tried troubleshooting with no resolution. HP site is not the most user friendly for novice.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: EXELETE PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: JUST IS A EXELENT PRODUCT IS WORKING GOOD FOR ME. . . . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: HP Laser Printer
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this printer for approximately 3 weeks. It was easy to install. It is noisier than my previous ink jet. It is very fast and has very good quality. It is a little taller than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: excellent product but have problems
customer_reviews.text: the product is excellent, like the seller offered me, but tha article have a problem with the scanner's glass, its broken, I dont know how is possible that this things can happen because the article came in the box, its incredible, WHERE CAN I CLAIM FOR THIS? OR IN ALL CASES, WHERE CAN I TO FIND THIS SCANNER GLASS AS REPOSITION?
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Tames Haces

customer_reviews.title: Lacks true network scanning. Won't install on Vista
customer_reviews.text: We have installed many HP MFC devices. I was surprised to find that this unit does not provide the ability to select the destination from the M1536 control panel. If a user wants to scan to his computer they have to initiate the scan at their computer. This is a major deficiency and impacts productivity. Also we've had a lot of problems installing this on Vista OS with no help from HP support. Their response to our problem was to return the printer. I would not recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Braham

customer_reviews.title: Should be better
customer_reviews.text: power cord does not stay in place - memory problems when printing certain doc - strange error codes appear often.
customer_reviews.author: donna venditto

customer_reviews.title: No usb Cable with this?????????????
customer_reviews.text: Just received this all in one disappointed for the money you spend you think they would include a usb cable, now I gotta run out
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turzo

customer_reviews.title: This Printer Stinks~
customer_reviews.text: This printer is horrific~ I{t does nothing you claim it will do~ i am returning it for a fujll refund!!! I was a fool for ever buying it~ it will not do wi fi or work on a wireless connection!!!!!! IT IS A JOKE~~~~~~~~ Dr Edwin C Baxley Jr
customer_reviews.author: Dr Edwin C Baxley Jr

product_meta.title: HP LaserJet Pro M1536dnf Multifunction Printer
product_meta.description:
HP LaserJet Pro M1536dnf MFP

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Designed with office productivity in mind, the HP LaserJet Pro M1536dnf delivers professional-quality documents with bold text and sharp images and has built-in wired networking so you and your colleagues can easily share printing, scanning, copying and faxing resources. Fax directly to and from a PC and control fax access with assigned PINs, and copy both sides of an ID card onto a single-sided document. 


WHY BUY?



FUNCTIONS




FEATURES






SPECIFICATIONS





REMEMBER ORIGINAL HP TONER AND PAPER



SAVE with X cartridges and combo packs







WHICH HP PRINTER IS RIGHT FOR YOU? 




Compare the good, better and best, side by side







 1. Requires an Internet connection to the printer. Feature works with any Internet- and email-capable device. Print times may vary. For a list of supported documents and image types, see www.hp.com/go/ePrintCenter. Some HP LaserJet products will require a firmware upgrade.
 2. Supports iOS 4.2 devices (iPad, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS, and 3rd and 4th generation iPod touch) that support multitasking. Works with HP ePrint-enabled printers and All-in-Ones. AirPrint and iOS 4.2 devices require an 802.11 wireless network connection to the printer. Wireless performance is dependent upon physical environment and distance from the access point. AirPrint and the AirPrint logo are trademarks of Apple Inc. iPad, iPhone and iPod touch are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
 3. Exact speed varies depending on system configuration, software application, driver, and document complexity.
 4. Based on ISO/IEC 19752 and continuous printing. Actual yields vary considerably based on images printed and other factors. For details see www.hp.com/go/learnaboutsupplies.
feature_bullets: Stay productive-Print at up to 26 ppm and get a first page out in as fast as 8.5 seconds.
Tackle multiple-page documents and two-sided prints with the 35-page automatic document feeder.
Fax directly to and from a PC, and control fax access with assigned PINs.
Share printing resources with an Ethernet-connected MFP.
Handle multiple media sizes and types with a 10-sheet priority tray and the 250-sheet paper tray. HP LaserJet recommends ColorLok papers for best printing results.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars214 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
